body.name: hansang LED Desk Lamp for Home Office with Wireless Charger, 3 Color Modes, Stepless Dimmable, Touch Control Black Study Lamp with Pen Holder for College Dorm Room, CRI 90, 800 Lumen, Adapter Included
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 13 mins
features: 【Wireless Charger & Pen Holder】This LED Desk Lamp for home office features a convenient 10W wireless charger, allowing you to charge your compatible devices without the need for messy cords. The lamp also comes with a built-in pen holder, keeping your desk organized and clutter-free. This touch-control desk lamp is compact and lightweight, making it perfect for college dorm rooms, bedrooms, offices, and more.

【3 Color Modes & Smooth Dimmable】 Choose from 3 color modes (warm white, natural daylight, bright daylight) to suit your preference and lighting needs. Enjoy the movie with warm white light and choose the daylight for reading or working. The table lamp with a stepless dimmable feature allows you to adjust the brightness level to create the perfect ambiance for any activity.

【Eye-Caring Desk Lamp with No Flicker】 The LED desk lamp for college dorm rooms provides 800-lumen flicker-free and glare-free lighting, reducing eye strain and fatigue during long hours of reading or studying. With a CRI 90+ rating, it delivers true and vibrant color representation, making it perfect for tasks that require accurate color distinction.

【Flexible Arm for Adjustable Angle】 The goose-neck design of the black study lamp provides 360-degree adjustable illumination, providing optimal lighting for different tasks and allowing you to focus light where you need it. Also, the sturdy base ensures stability and prevents the lamp from tipping over.

【Safe Desk Lamp For College Dorm Room】 This desk lamp with a wireless charger is built to last up to 50,000 hours and strictly meet the safety standard of CE, FCC, and RoHS, which is safe enough for students to use. It comes with an adapter for easy and immediate use. 100% Free replacement can be provided for any quality issues. Feel free to contact us and we would be glad to assist you within 12 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product charges phone and is an extra lamp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Office Lamp/Phone Charger/Pen Holder
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this office lamp distributed by Hansang for about $30.It includes the power supply and lamp unit. The Lamp unit incorporates a pen (misc) holder compartment and an integral phone charger. The charger works when the phone is placed sideways (not vertical, as shown on the ad) and the lamp turned on or off. It charged my phone, even while in the Otter case.There is an on/off button and lamp temperature button. When power is disconnected and reconnected, the power button remains in off position and you must press it to turn the lamp no. Therefore, it's not Alexa friendly. But, this is a minor issue.I found the value to be there for the $30 purchase price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really nice add-on to my study, just wish the mag safe charger worked better for the 14 Pro MAX
reviews.reviewText: Overall the lamp is nice. I like how you can change the color of the light from that warm yellowish color, to daylight white color. I also like the little storage pocket in the lamp for misc pens and markers. I like the idea that this also has a magsafe charger, but i haven't found it to work that great with my iphone 14 Pro Max. Its very finicky and i have a magsafe case too. I just don't think this base was made well for the Pro Max size phone to work with - so just a heads up on that.Other than the charging issue, the light works well and is well balanced (meaning it doesn't topple over when you bend it downwards). So pretty good quality, obviously best for someone with the normal size phone (but this should have been mentioned in the description)Overall grade = B+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Stylish and Functional Desk Companion
reviews.reviewText: I recently got this LED Desk Lamp with Wireless Charger, and its versatile lighting options have truly elevated my workspace. This lamp not only boasts a convenient 10W wireless charger but also offers three distinct color modes, including a warm white light that enhances the overall ambiance of my workspace.The ability to choose from three color modes is a game-changer. The warm white light, in particular, creates a cozy and inviting atmosphere, perfect for late-night work sessions or reading. The lamp's other color modes, including cool white and daylight, cater to different tasks and preferences, ensuring that the lighting is always tailored to my needs.The 10W wireless charger is incredibly handy, eliminating the need for extra cords and keeping my desk tidy. Its placement is well-thought-out, making it easy to charge my compatible devices while I work. The built-in pen holder further contributes to the lamp's functionality, promoting an organized and clutter-free workspace.The touch-control feature remains intuitive and responsive, allowing me to effortlessly adjust brightness levels and switch between color modes with a simple touch. The lamp's compact and lightweight design makes it easy to position on my desk, providing focused illumination without occupying excessive space.Overall, the LED Desk Lamp with Wireless Charger has exceeded my expectations. Its combination of practical features, including the 10W wireless charger and three color modes, makes it a versatile and essential tool for anyone seeking a stylish and functional desk companion. Whether you're working late into the night or tackling creative projects, this lamp enhances your workspace with its thoughtful design and customizable lighting options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and comes with a charger!
reviews.reviewText: Very sleek design and it has great brightness. Can also charge your phone wirelessly which is extremely useful (especially when the base where you place your phone is angled so you can just have it as a stand to have a video playing while doing other stuff). The pen holder is as expected so overall the wireless charger is a seller for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS DESK LAMP
reviews.reviewText: 5/5 STARS. I USE THIS DESK LAMP EVERDAY. I LOVE THE WIRELESS CHARGER AND SIMPLICITY OF THE LAMP SHAPE/SIZE. I LIKE THE 3 LIGHT OPTIONS AND IT CAN DIM OR BE AT ITS BRIGHTEST. I HAD MOUNTED A SMALLER MIRROR ON THE BACK SIDE OF THE LAMP SO I CAN SEE MYSELF WITH A NICE BACKLIGHT. THE PEN / SCISSORS HOLDER IS SMALL, BUT CAN HOLD 2 LARGE SCISSORS, SOME PENS AND SHARPIES. IT KEEPS THE SPACE SIMPLE AND SLEEK. EXCELLENT PRODUCT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super functional, good light, and fairly stylish.
reviews.reviewText: I have been thoroughly enjoying this desk lamp in a way that I wouldn't have though I would. The functionality of the built in charger is ... decent but not the greatest. It does however make a lovely stand for your phone to let you watch videos on while working on something and still pumping some charge into it. The built in pen cup is divided into two separate cups, I keep pens/pencils on one side and markers/highlighters on the other. The buttons on this unit are essentially touch activation adding to the simplicity of the control scheme and allowing for very easy on/off and cycling of modes. The modes themselves have proven to be one of my favorite features. All the light modes are very bright with good spill to them, and they adjustment of the color temperatures is ideal for me, allowing clean cold white light when I need it and smooth warm light when I want a softer feel. Combine that with an excellent neck adjustment and this unit makes for a massively functional piece with some nice amenities.
